AboutCompany.title: ABOUT COMPANY
AboutCompany.description1: MY SOFTAKE PLC. is a forward-thinking technology and business solutions company committed to delivering innovative, reliable, and efficient services across multiple industries. With a focus on quality, customer satisfaction, and sustainable growth, the company provides modern digital solutions, profes-sional support, and value-driven services that help businesses operate smarter and faster. MY SOFTAKE PLC. continues to expand its capabilities, ensuring excellence through technology, expertise, and strategic vision.
AboutCompany.description2: We continue to move forward with confidence, shaping a future where global reach is guided by shared values and lasting trust.
AboutCompany.experience_desc: Our great team of more than 1400 software experts.
AboutCompany.quickSupport_desc: We’ll help you test bold new ideas while sharing your.

OurService.title: Our Services
OurService.description: We provide diversified services to support your business growth with reliability and excellence.
OurService.service1_desc: Information technology services provide secure, scaleable solutions that drive efficiency, reliability, and business growth through smart use of technology.
OurService.service2_desc: Export and import services enable seamless global trade by ensuring efficient, compliant, and reliable cross-border movement of goods.
OurService.service3_desc: Manufacturing & Production involve transforming raw materials into high-quality finished goods through efficient processes, technology, and skilled operations.
OurService.service4_desc: Transport & Logistics ensure the efficient movement, storage, and delivery of goods through coordinated transportation and supply chain management systems.
OurService.service5_desc: Travel & Tourism involves facilitating journeys and experiences, connecting people to destinations while managing services, hospitality, and cultural exploration efficiently.
OurService.service6_desc: Construction & Infrastructure delivers sustainable, high-quality structures that drive urban growth and development.

We provide solutions that help organizations reduce costs and improve operational efficiency.Our collaborative approach ensures transparency and strong client relationships. MY SOFTAKE PVT. PLC. is your reliable partner for sustainable IT solutions and digital growth. We aim to empower businesses with technology that delivers measurable results.

2.title: Export & Import

2.desc: MY SOFTAKE PVT. PLC. is a trusted Export & Import company with a manufacturing base in China. We provide high-quality products, seamless logistics, and end-to-end solutions for clients worldwide, ensuring timely delivery, compliance, and global business growth.

Our team manages every stage of the export-import process, ensuring smooth operations across borders. We prioritize timely delivery and seamless logistics to serve global clients without delays. Every project reflects our dedication to quality and excellence. Customer satisfaction is the foundation of our global business strategy. MY SOFTAKE PVT. PLC. stands as a reliable bridge between manufacturers in China and markets worldwide.
2.why_choose_us: At MY SOFTAKE PVT. PLC., we combine global sourcing expertise with professional export-import services. We maintain high-quality standards, ensuring products meet international regulations. Our experience ensures cost-effective solutions for both importing and exporting goods. We manage all customs, documentation, and logistics, making international trade hassle-free. Global trade made simple, reliable, and efficient. Our flexible operations allow us to handle both bulk shipments and customized orders. We prioritize timely delivery to keep your business operations smooth.
2.choce_one: We offer transparency at every stage, ensuring clients are informed and confident. Our team is trained to navigate international trade regulations seamlessly. We adopt innovative approaches to optimize shipping, reduce costs, and improve efficiency. Excellence in service, reliability in delivery. We value long-term partnerships over short-term gains. Customer satisfaction, trust, and quality are central to everything we do. Your business growth is our global mission. Choosing MY SOFTAKE PVT. PLC. means choosing a dependable partner for international trade success.

ProjectData.pageDescription: Discover our innovative projects across multiple industries, showcasing our expertise and commitment to excellence.

labels.itFieldUsage: You May Also Know How it Uses In IT Field?

1.title: Smart Factory Automation
1.description: Automated production line to increase efficiency and reduce downtime.
1.longDescription: Our Smart Factory Automation project revolutionizes traditional manufacturing by integrating industry 4.0 standards. We implemented IoT sensors and automated arms that communicate in real-time to prevent errors before they happen. This system allows managers to monitor every aspect of production from a central dashboard.
challenges: Integrating legacy machinery with modern IoT sensors.
Ensuring zero-latency communication between robotic arms.
Training staff to operate the new automated dashboard.
1.results: Increased production speed by 45% and reduced human error by 90%.

2.title: Industrial IoT Project
2.description: IoT-enabled machines for real-time monitoring and predictive maintenance.
2.longDescription: This project involves deploying thousands of sensors across the factory floor to collect data on machine health, temperature, and performance. The system predicts potential failures before they occur, saving millions in repair costs.
challenges: Handling high-frequency data streams without latency.
Ensuring sensor durability in high-temperature environments.
End-to-end data encryption for security.
2.results: Reduced unplanned downtime by 35% within the first quarter.

3.title: Global Export Hub
3.description: A platform to manage international export and import operations seamlessly.
3.longDescription: A centralized hub designed to track shipments, manage documentation, and handle customs clearance in a single digital environment. It connects exporters, importers, and logistics providers in real-time.
challenges: Integrating multiple international customs APIs.
Real-time currency conversion and tax calculation.
Multi-language support for global users.

4.title: Export Compliance System
4.description: Digital solution to ensure compliance with international trade regulations.
4.longDescription: This system automates the legal checks required for international trade, ensuring all cargo meets the destination country's specific laws and avoids heavy penalties.
challenges: Keeping the database updated with global law changes.
Automated PDF document generation for legal filing.
Secure digital signatures for all trade documents.

5.title: Company IT Infrastructure
5.description: Setting up secure IT infrastructure for company-wide operations.
5.longDescription: A complete overhaul of corporate networking, server management, and cybersecurity protocols. We moved the entire operation to a hybrid cloud model for maximum security and scalability.
challenges: Migrating 10TB of data without downtime.
Setting up hardware firewalls across 3 branch offices.
Implementing Zero-Trust security architecture.
5.results: Achieved 99.99% uptime and zero security breaches.

6.title: Corporate IT Helpdesk
6.description: 24/7 IT support system for employees and business operations.
6.longDescription: An AI-powered ticketing system and support portal that provides instant technical assistance to over 5,000 employees worldwide, reducing manual support workload.
challenges: Training AI to understand complex technical queries.
Integration with Microsoft Teams and Slack.
Managing high ticket volumes during system updates.

7.title: City Logistics Network
7.description: Optimized logistics network connecting warehouses and stores efficiently.
7.longDescription: Smart route planning and fleet management software designed to reduce delivery times and fuel consumption within urban areas using real-time traffic data.
challenges: Real-time GPS tracking and traffic prediction.
Balancing load distribution across the delivery fleet.
Reducing carbon footprint of last-mile delivery.
7.results: Reduced fuel costs by 20% and delivery time by 15 mins per order.

8.title: Airport Transport Management
8.description: End-to-end management of airport transport services for passengers and cargo.
8.longDescription: Integrated software to manage airport shuttles, cargo loaders, and flight synchronization for ground handling teams at major international airports.
challenges: Syncing schedules with real-time flight delay data.
High-security protocol for airside vehicle access.
Managing driver shifts and vehicle maintenance logs.

9.title: Tourist Booking Portal
9.description: An online portal for booking travel and tourism packages easily.
9.longDescription: A feature-rich booking engine offering personalized travel itineraries, hotel bookings, and guided tour reservations with an integrated payment gateway.
challenges: Handling real-time inventory for tour operators.
Secure payment processing in multiple currencies.
Mobile-first responsive design for travelers.
9.results: Increased online bookings by 40% in the first two months.

10.title: Urban Infrastructure Development
10.description: Development of roads, bridges, and buildings with modern techniques.
10.longDescription: Implementing sustainable building materials and smart sensors in construction to monitor structural integrity and energy efficiency over time.
challenges: Sourcing eco-friendly construction materials.
Installing fiber-optic sensors inside concrete structures.
Adhering to strict urban safety and noise regulations.
10.results: Structure lifespan estimated to increase by 20 years through predictive monitoring.

CaseStudy.bannerDescription: Explore our comprehensive case studies showcasing innovative solutions and measurable results across industries.

1.title: Assetra End-to-End Asset Optimisation
1.overview: Assetra partnered with a large asset-intensive organisation facing rising operational costs and fragmented asset management practices. Our team assessed their entire asset portfolio to identify inefficiencies and develop a comprehensive optimisation strategy.
1.challenges: Limited visibility across lifecycle, reactive maintenance, and scattered asset data leading to high operational risk and increased costs.
1.approach: Implemented end-to-end strategy covering asset assessment, predictive maintenance, and long-term renewal planning with advanced analytics.
results: 40% reduction in Total Cost of Ownership
Clear lifecycle roadmap for future investments

2.title: Smart Factory Automation Upgrade
2.overview: Collaborated with a manufacturing giant to modernise legacy systems using IoT and AI-driven automation for enhanced productivity.
2.challenges: Manual processes, frequent hardware failures, and lack of real-time production monitoring affecting overall efficiency.
2.approach: Deployment of smart sensors and a centralised control system to automate workflow and monitoring across all production units.
results: Real-time data visibility across all units

3.title: Supply Chain Digital Transformation
3.overview: Redesigning the supply chain network for a global retail brand to enhance delivery speed and reduce operational overhead.
3.challenges: Inaccurate inventory forecasting and inefficient route planning causing delivery delays and customer dissatisfaction.
3.approach: Integrated an AI forecasting tool and optimised logistics routes using machine learning algorithms for better accuracy.

4.title: Renewable Energy Grid Integration
4.overview: Assisting a regional power utility in integrating solar and wind energy into their existing grid infrastructure.
4.challenges: Grid instability and high cost of integrating non-continuous energy sources with traditional power systems.
4.approach: Developed a smart grid management system with advanced battery storage solutions for reliable energy distribution.
results: Enhanced grid stability and storage capacity

5.title: Healthcare Data Interoperability Project
5.overview: Creating a seamless data sharing platform for a network of healthcare providers to improve patient care coordination.
5.challenges: Siloed patient data and privacy concerns preventing efficient care coordination across multiple facilities.
5.approach: Built a secure, GDPR-compliant cloud database with API access for all clinics ensuring data security and accessibility.
results: Zero data breaches during first year

6.title: Smart City Infrastructure Development
6.target: Enhance urban mobility and public safety
6.overview: Partnering with municipal authorities to implement smart lighting and traffic management solutions for urban areas.
6.challenges: Congested traffic flow and high crime rates in under-lit urban areas affecting citizen safety and mobility.
6.approach: Installed smart LED streetlights and AI-powered traffic signal controllers for optimised urban management.

GetInTouch.title: Driving business growth through smart, reliable technology.
GetInTouch.peragraph: Schedule a meeting to explore tailored solutions for your unique business needs.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Can’t find what you’re looking for? We’re here to help.

q1.question: How can I add a new institution to compare?
q1.answer: You can add institutions using our comparison tool or contact us with the relevant details.

q2.question: How often is the information updated?
q2.answer: We update our database on a quarterly basis and continuously monitor for any changes.

q3.question: Is this service free of charge?
q3.answer: Yes, our comparison tool is completely free for students.

q4.question: Can institutions claim their profile?
q4.answer: Yes, institutions can claim and manage their profiles to ensure information accuracy.

CareerPage.formDescription: Please fill in all the necessary information before submitting for the position you are interested in

formLabels.name: Name
formLabels.coverLetterPlaceholder: Tell us why you're a good fit...

1.description: BJIT is hiring a Cloud DevOps Engineer to manage cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, automation, and deployment using modern DevOps tools and cloud platforms.
1.experience: 1 to 3 year(s) hands on experience with Public Cloud platforms (Azure/AWS/GCP)
jobResponsibilities: Work as a team member of a DevOps team or work independently.
Design and implement DevSecOps solutions based on business requirements using modern cloud-native technologies.
Support team lead to design complete solution of Cloud & DevOps services.
Deploy and manage containerised applications using Docker and Kubernetes (AKS/EKS/GKE) with Helm charts.
Implement monitoring and observability solutions using Prometheus/Grafana or Datadog.
additionalRequirements: Strong hands-on experience with Terraform.
Experience with security best practices including secrets management and network policies.
Working knowledge of RDBMS (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and NoSQL databases.
Basic programming skills in Python or Go for automation.

2.description: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer proficient in Next.js and Node.js to build scalable web applications.
2.educationalRequirements: Bachelor's degree in CSE, IT or related field.
2.experience: 4+ years of professional software development experience.
jobResponsibilities: Lead the development of complex web applications using React and Next.js.
Architect and maintain robust server-side logic using Node.js and Express.
Collaborate with the UI/UX team to ensure high-quality design implementation.
Perform code reviews and mentor junior developers.
additionalRequirements: Expertise in TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
Deep understanding of state management like Redux or Zustand.
Hands-on experience with MongoDB or PostgreSQL.
Familiarity with AWS services and CI/CD workflows.

3.description: Join our design team to create intuitive digital products and maintain consistent brand identities across platforms.
3.educationalRequirements: Graduate in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, or related discipline.
3.experience: 2+ years of experience in product design.
jobResponsibilities: Create high-fidelity mockups, wireframes, and interactive prototypes.
Conduct user research and usability testing to iterate on designs.
Maintain and evolve our internal design system.
Collaborate with developers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation.
additionalRequirements: Mastery of Figma, Adobe XD, and Photoshop.
Strong understanding of visual hierarchy, typography, and colour theory.
Ability to present and defend design decisions to stakeholders.
Knowledge of basic HTML/CSS is a plus.

4.description: Build and deploy machine learning models to solve complex real-world problems and enhance product intelligence.
4.educationalRequirements: MSc or BSc in CSE, Mathematics, or Data Science.
jobResponsibilities: Design, develop, and test machine learning models for predictive analysis.
Pre-process and clean large datasets for model training.
Optimise existing ML algorithms for better performance and scalability.
Deploy models to production using FastAPI or Flask.
additionalRequirements: Proficiency in Python and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.
Experience with Natural Language Processing (NLP) or Computer Vision.
Knowledge of SQL and Big Data technologies.
Solid understanding of statistics and linear algebra.

5.description: Ensure the security and integrity of our corporate networks and cloud infrastructure against cyber threats.
5.educationalRequirements: BSc in CSE or Cyber Security.
jobResponsibilities: Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
Monitor network traffic for suspicious activity and potential breaches.
Develop and implement security protocols and firewalls.
Respond to and investigate security incidents.
additionalRequirements: Certifications like CEH, CISSP, or CompTIA Security+.
Experience with penetration testing tools like Kali Linux or Metasploit.
Strong understanding of encryption, VPNs, and IAM.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

6.description: Optimise international export and import operations whilst ensuring compliance with global trade regulations.
6.educationalRequirements: Bachelor in Supply Chain Management or Business Administration.
6.experience: 3 to 5 years in logistics or supply chain.
jobResponsibilities: Analyse and improve logistics workflows to reduce costs and lead times.
Manage relationships with international vendors and freight forwarders.
Ensure compliance with customs laws and global trade regulations.
Oversee inventory management and demand forecasting.
additionalRequirements: Proficiency in ERP systems like SAP or Oracle.
Strong negotiation and vendor management skills.
Excellent analytical skills using Excel or Power BI.
Knowledge of international shipping documentation.

VisionMission.visionDesc: MY SOFTAKE PLC envisions becoming a leading global force in innovative technology and business solutions. Our vision is to create a smarter, more connected future where organisations can grow confidently with the support of intelligent, efficient, and sustainable systems. Through continuous innovation, customer-centric development, and a commitment to excellence, we strive to empower businesses to transform, thrive, and achieve long-term success in an ever-evolving digital world.
VisionMission.missionDesc: MY SOFTAKE PLC is dedicated to delivering high-quality, innovative, and reliable solutions that meet the evolving needs of businesses across diverse industries. Our mission is to enhance operational efficiency, strengthen digital capabilities, and provide value-driven services that support sustainable growth. We work with integrity, professionalism, and a customer-first mindset, ensuring every solution we deliver contributes to long-term success, stronger performance, and meaningful impact for our clients and communities.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.introduction1: At MultiService Agency, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services.
PrivacyPage.introduction2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access our services.
PrivacyPage.section1_1Desc: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
section1_1List2: Name and contact details (email, phone, address)

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.importantNotice: Important: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
TermsPage.section1Desc: By accessing and using the services provided by MultiService Agency, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services.
section1List: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and MultiService Agency.
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice.
Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
